comments:

windows, but each time I try to load it, I get the following error in the error 
log: Please find enclosed the error log for your perusal: Please help me ASAP



!SESSION ----------------------------------------------------------------------

!MESSAGE Exception launching the Eclipse Platform:

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError

This stack trace is for a 3.0 build of Eclipse, not 2.1. It is a duplicate of
bug 57746.
This is not an EMF problem.

I have download Eclipse 2.1 and it is working fine with JDK 1.3. Thanks for 
your help. You can close this bug now.
